reviews.comments:
Lo mejor del alojamiento de Cynthia es la ubicación. El departamento está ubicado sobre una avenida principal de la ciudad, a muy pocos metros de una estación del subte D. Rodeada de locales comerciales, en una zona segura y con mucho movimiento. Desde el piso en que se ubica el depto no se escuchan ruidos de la calle, se puede descansar tranquilo. 
Encontramos el espacio muy limpio y cuidado. Es muy luminoso y lindo decorado.
Para el calor que hace en enero en Bs As puede resultar insuficiente el único aire acondicionado con el que cuenta el depto.
reviews.response: Bienvenidas nuevamente cuando gusten!

reviews.comments: El dpto es hermoso! Muy muy cómodo y amplio! muy buena relación precio / calidad! Muy buena ubicación! Con Cynthia todo excelente! La pasamos genial!
reviews.response: Me alegro mucho que hayan disfrutado. Fue un placer. Espero recibirlas en una nueva oportunidad.

reviews.response: Gracias Eduardo, espero recibirte nuevamente!

reviews.comments: El departamento es muy cómodo, la ubicación excelente, y tanto Cynthia como su vecina, estuvieron en todo momento predispuestas para cualquier cosa que necesitáramos. La verdad súper recomendable!

No se decepcionarán!!!

reviews.comments: Solo puedo tener comentaros positivos en esta primera experiencia en Airbnb, además con un anfitrión maravilloso. Cynthia me ayudo con todas las dudas e hizo que tuviéramos una muy grata estadía. Además el sitio esta súper buen localizado (estación de subte ahí al lado) y el apartamento estaba igual que en las fotos, muy limpio y muy agradable. Lo recomiendo ampliamente. Gracias Cynthia (también a Jorgelina que nos ayudó muchísimo). Saludos
reviews.response:
Ivonne, infinitas gracias. Hoy Jorgelina me dió los deliciosos chocolates. Que dulce sorpresa!!
Mil gracias y bienvenidos cuando quieran! :)

reviews.comments:
Aunque no conocí a Cynthia directamente, las comunicaciones con ella fueron faciles y amables. Ella nos envió toda la información importante antes de llegamos y nos ayudó nuestro grupo con transportación al aeropuerto. El departamento es precioso y muy cómodo. Hay mucho espacio para un grupo y está ubicada en una zona supercentral. 

Although I did not meet Cynthia in person, the communications I had with her were simple and friendly. She sent us all of the important information before we arrived and helped our group with transportation to the airport. The apartment is cute and very comfortable. There is a lot of space for a group and it is well located in a central area in the city.
reviews.response: Thank you so much, it was a pleasure

Excelente estadía en Buenos Aires en el lindo departamento de Cynthia. Muy bien localizado, silencioso y agradable.

El lugar es fantástico! Espacioso, limpio, ideal para un grupo de 3 personas. La ubicación si bien un tanto ruidosa es excelente para conocer la ciudad y no sólo palermo. Parada de colectivo y la línea D del Subte a pasitos.

Lo recomiendo plenamente y por supuesto volveríamos a quedarnos.

reviews.comments: El departamento es tal como aparece  en las fotos, muy bien cuidado y súper bien ubicado, recomendable 100% . Nos esperaban a la hora indicada y Jorgelina muy amable y dispuesta a resolver nuestras inquietudes . Gracias Cynthia

reviews.comments:
El departamento es muy lindo, la ubicación es perfecta, además de estar muy bien equipado.
Nada que decir, es un gran lugar igual a como se ve en las fotos. Ideal para ir en familia, si vas con amigos no se debe hacer ruido o fiesta después de las 23:00 por los vecinos.
A pesar de no haber conocido a Cynthia ella siempre respondió todas mis dudas y no tuve problema ni al llegar, ni al irme del apartamento.

Very nice, spacious and well-equipped apartment in great location.  Cynthia was a great host and always answered any question immediately.  Kitchen has everything you need, including a nice dish-washer, and plenty of kitchenware.  There is one queen-sized bed, and the rest of the beds are singles.
reviews.response: Thank you for your staying. Welcome any time

reviews.comments: Cynthias apartment in Alto Palermo is well located to explore Buenos Aires. The Apartment was clean, tidy and well equipped. We got a warm welcome by Cynthias neighbor and some useful information were provided from her as well. We would definitely stay here again and would highly recommend this place.
reviews.response: Thank You Belinda, It was a pleasure to host you

reviews.comments: If you consider stay at Buenos Aires, this house is the best choice. Host is very kind and nice. We had a good time for her.
reviews.response: Thanks Dong! It was a big pleasure to host you!

reviews.comments: Our stay in BA was great. This apartment is in a excellent location with easy access to shopping and restaurants. It’s on a busy street, which makes it an exciting stay. There’s a market across the street for all grocery needs. The apartment was very clean and appeared exactly as pictured in the listing. Communication with the host was clear, and check-in was easy and informative. Would recommend!
reviews.response: Thanks Brittany! Pleasure to host you

reviews.comments: This house is in a great location, close to supermarkets, shopping mall and restaurants. It was perfect for our family.
reviews.response: Thank you so much! It was a pleasure to host you!

reviews.comments: Cynthia's friend checked us in, and was very friendly and helpful despite the language barrier. Cynthia wasn't able to meet our group in person, but she was always prompt and helpful in her response to any questions we had during our stay. The place was clean, bright and cozy, centrally located, and very close to metro station, restaurants, as well as a big shopping center where you can exchange currency. The kitchen has all the necessary appliances, but was on the small side, and didn't have many utensils for food preparation. So it's only suitable for light cooking. The additional half bath was great for getting ready in the morning, especially for a group of women! There was one A/C unit in one of the bedrooms, while the other two rooms had ceiling fans. So the rooms without A/C might get a little stuffy during especially hot nights. I tried leaving the window open, but had to close it after getting bit by mosquitoes. And the unit being in an older building, be sure not to leave any food out in the open lest you attract unwanted pests. But all in all it's a great value for its location, amenities, and a great host!
reviews.response: Thanks Monica, It was a pleasure to host you

reviews.comments: It was perfect for three adults.  Three separate bedrooms, close to grocery store, restaurants and (URL HIDDEN) is about 55 minutes from EZE airport from taxi ride.
reviews.response: Thank You Sang, It was a big pleasure to host you all

reviews.comments: Great Airbnb! Stayed for about a week with two friends - plenty of space for the three of us! Conveniently located and looks just like the photos. Cynthia was a great host and was very responsive. Thank you!

There is a subway stop very near the apartment although we did not need to use it because everything was so walkable.  The apartment was spacious, clean, and everything worked properly.  Even though it is on a busy street, we did not have any issues with noise.  Cynthia was easy to communicate with and Jorgelina was very nice and helpful to us as well.  I highly recommend this apartment for anyone wanting to explore BA.

reviews.comments: Réactivité immédiate de Cynthia pour la réservation et les renseignements.Excellent accueil par Georgina qui parle très bien français. L'appartement est spacieux, propre, bien équipé et très bien situé. Je vous recommande ce logement sans réserve.

reviews.comments: Excelente apartamento, limpo, bem ventilado é ótima localização. Estávamos em 5 adultos, perfeito para nós. O apartamento fica a uma quadra da estação de metrô e Shopping Alto Palermo. Adoramos!

reviews.comments: Excellent place to stay in Buenos Aires
Cynthia was a great host and owns a very nice place. Perhaps a bit small for us, although our group included 4 guys so it's always hard to cater for us perfectly.
reviews.response: Thanks Matt. Welcome anytime :)

reviews.comments:
We had a great stay on Cynthia's apartment. In short, it is a well located and well-equipped apartment for those who want to see Buenos Aires.
I didn't meet Cynthia in person but she was easy to reach by message when I needed.
The apartment is clean and well equipped. We mostly stayed out all day only having breakfast at the apartment and watching a bit of TV in the evening. For this we had all we needed. Nevertheless, for those interested, it is possible to cook and keep groceries because there is a well-equipped kitchen. The wi-fi is very good and the TV has many channels. We were only four people staying at the apartment, so we had the living room/dinner room free to watch TV and have meals without bothering anyone that wants to sleep. A good thing for those who like too oversleep a little is that there are blinds on the windows that can make the room very dark even during the day.
The building is two blocks from a subway station and a lot of buses stop in front of the building. It is ideal for someone who goes to Buenos Aires and wants to explore the city using public transportation. Since the street is so busy there is a lot of traffic noise during the day but, during the night it is not too noisy and only one of the bedrooms faces the street. For someone that likes to walk it is also a good location. Many of the city sights like Casa Rosada, Porto Madero and others are at walkable distances (30-60min walk) and there are a lot of parks close by (10-15min walk). Another good point about the location of the building is that there are a lot of shops on the street of the apartment, a supermarket right in front of the building, some restaurants close by and a shopping mall two blocks away. Most of them are open till 9-10pm.
reviews.response:
Gracias Juliana por tan buen review para la comunidad ya que fue muy detallada tu descripción y lo encuentro de mucha utilidad para un turista. 
Fue un placer recibirlos y espero poder recibirlos en una nueva oportunidad :)

reviews.comments: I really enjoy my stay in Cynthia's apartment, family friendly environment, check in and prior information clear and timely. We had a warm welcome and Cynthia was looking after us during our stay
reviews.response: Thank You so much! It was a pleasure!

reviews.comments:
A beautiful apartment in a good location. The place was clean with excellent facilities, 6 of us stayed and there was plenty of room for us all. 

What made the stay particularly memorable was Cynthia's exceptionally accommodating approach and warm emails. Nothing was too much bother and she was very quick to reply to all questions. She is a great host!
reviews.response: Thank You so Much. It was a pleasure to host you

reviews.comments: Great place in a fantastic location! Thank you for everything!
reviews.response: Thanks Anna! Welcome anytime

reviews.comments: Location is excellent, many wonderful restaurants in the area. Apartment has a great balcony for watching the sunset over the city.
reviews.response: Thank You very Much! It was a pleasure to host you

reviews.comments: It's a great cozy and comfortble apartment. It has an amazing location, really close to a subway station that leads you to several points of interest. Cynthia is a good host, objective and helpful. I would stay there again a thousand times.
reviews.response: Muitisimas Gracias! Prazer receber voce!!! Welcome anytime!

reviews.comments: Cynthia was a great host.  Although I never met her, she always communicated very well before arriving, and her friend, Jorgelina, welcomed us and was always around when we needed her.  The place was warm and inviting and was well equipped  and had all the amenities that she offers.  I felt the home was right in the middle of BA.  There was a market right across the street, the subway was just a block away, and there were several buses right outside on Santa Fe, and we even took bus 152 to see La Boca.  If you like walking around, the place is easy to walk to the gardens, the Evita museum, the Recoleta area, the Plaza Italia, etc.  I always felt very safe and secure.  At night we took a quick taxi ride to many restaurants in other areas of Palermo.  There are also several restaurants within walking distance as well.  We loved the fact that we can come home in the middle of the day, have some lunch, and then continue our exploration of Buenos Aires.  One of us especially loved having lunch on the balcony.  The balcony was great especially since it was over all the trees, which shaded us from the street traffic.  The apartment was very quite even though there were people walking and driving around the area.  I wish I had a few more days in BA.
reviews.response: Hi Sunita: Thank You so much for your excellent review. So happy to know you apreciate everything! You are so Nice! It was a big pleasure to host you! :)

reviews.comments:
The apartment is very luminous and open. We used it as a 3 bedroom apartment with no issues. It is small for Texas standards but large for Buenos Aires or any other large city. 
Communication with Cynthia was very good, she would answer any questions in an hour or less. 
The location is awesome! Very nice area, close to everything.
We had a great time and would not hesitate to come back!
reviews.response: Gracias Gabriela, fue un gran placer haberlos recibido. Las puertas esta abiertas para cualquier ocasión! Un abrazo, Cynthia

reviews.comments: O apartamento é igual à fotos. A localização também é ótima, bem próximo ao metrô. A anfitriã é cordial e objetiva. Recomendo!
Beautiful and spacious apartment in cute area.
reviews.response: Thanks Leora

reviews.comments: Foi maravilhoso ficar no apartamento de Cynthia. Lugar extremamente limpo e agradável, o custo benefício é muito bom, recomendo.
reviews.response: Obrigadisima Bruno!!!

reviews.comments:
O apartamento é simplesmente ótimo! As acomodações são excelentes, tudo muito limpo e pratico. Há, na mesma avenida, supermercado, restaurantes, cafés e uma estação de metrô a poucos metros de distância. As opções de entretenimento no bairro São, também, muitas! Recomendo! 
A Cynthia também foi muito atenciosa e nos ajudou bastante a organizar a nossa chegada!
reviews.response: Obrigadisima! Pracer!

reviews.comments: Cynthia was always available for communication and was very nice to let us in early to the apartment after a long flight and small children. She was very accommodating and kept us informed about who to speak with and how to reach her if we needed anything.
reviews.response: Thanks for all the advises, I will try to make them better

reviews.comments: We had a wonderful time in Buenos Aires. Cynthia' apartment was great in every way. Location was ideal and her apartment was well organized and spotless. When I come back to Buenos Aires I would love to stay here again.
reviews.response: ThankS . It was a pleasure! Welcome anytime!

reviews.comments: Ottima esperienza a Buenos Aires. L'appartamento è esattamente come appare nelle foto. Location estremamente comoda, nel quartiere Palermo e vicinissimo alla fermata Metro. Non abbiamo conosciuto direttamente l'host Cynthia ma è stata sempre estremamente gentile e disponibile nel fornirci tutte le indicazioni prima e durante il soggiorno. Da sottolineare la disponibilità nel consentirci il check in anticipato. Consigliatissimo!
reviews.response: Grazie, Angelo , è stato un piacere conoscerti . Bentornato

reviews.comments: Great apartment good location clean and airy Cynthia was very helpful.
reviews.response: Thanks! Welcome anytime

reviews.comments:
We are a family of five that wanted to spend a short stay in Buenos Aires (2 days). Cynthia's apartment was great. Excellent apartment, clean, tidy, and in a perfect location.
If we have the chance we would definitively come back.

Thanks
JuaN
reviews.response: Gracias Juan, fue un placer recibirlos!

reviews.comments: O apartamento é muito bom, a localização ótima.
Sim a descrição esta correta, otima localização
It was great. Great apartment and good location.
Appartement très bien situé, lumineux et bien agencé.
reviews.response: Merci Morgane, un plaicir de te avoir recu

reviews.comments: This apartment is amazing! Great views of the city and a great location. Cynthia was very communicative and helpful. I would highly recommend staying here if you are visiting Buenos Aires!
reviews.response: Thanks John, welcome next time

reviews.comments: Sehr gutes Apartment in zentraler Lage von Palermo mit direkter Verkehrsanbindung zu U-Bahn und Bus und nahen Einkaufsmöglichkeiten. Laute Straße, aber Wohnung im oberen Stockwerk und Schlafräume nach hinten.  Insgesamt sehr zu empfehlen.
